content:
Kansas baseballs Benjamin Sems left and mens golfs Jeff Doty right PERIOD

Jeff Doty  Mens Golf

Participating in his first conference postseason competition redshirt freshman Jeff Doty was the Jayhawks top finisher at the Big  Championships in White Sulphur Springs West Virginia PERIOD Tapping in eight birdies over the course of his three rounds Doty finished the tournament with a score of  putting him fourover par for a 21stplace finish PERIOD As a team the Jayhawks finished ninth overall PERIOD

Benjamin Sems  Baseball

For the second time this season junior shortstop Benjamin Sems cleared the fence two times propelling the Jayhawks to a  victory in their season finale against Furman on Sunday PERIOD The juniors first homerun came early in the first inning setting the tone for offensive showcase put on by Kansas through the remainder of the day PERIOD Sems second long ball in the fourth kick started an eightrun inning for the Jayhawks PERIOD

 Years of Kansas Basketball

Retired Jerseys

Its the coliseum that is home to Kansas basketballs 13straight titles Coach Player and Freshman of the Year PERIOD Video by Brandon CotterKANSAN
